name: Kenku
languages: understands Auran and Common but speaks only through the use of its Mimicry trait

traits.Ambusher: In the first round of a combat, the kenku has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it surprised.
traits.Mimicry: The kenku can mimic any sounds it has heard, including voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 14+1d4 + 12 Wisdom (Insight) check.

actions.Shortsword: Melee Weapon Attack: +5+1d4 + 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.
actions.Shortbow: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5+1d4 + 3 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.
